Name: Bubble Shot
About the game: Bubble Shot revisits the cheerful pixelated quirkiness of the original Puzzle Bobble (Bust-A-Move). Play casual mode and lose yourself in 50 levels of bubble-bursting excitement. Take on challenge mode to push your bubble-shooting skills to the limit. Face all levels back-to-back in arcade mode. Think you can make it all the way? Earn achievements by completing difficult levels. Compete against the best players by setting high scores on worldwide leaderboards. Are you ready? Let's shoot some bubbles!
